snippet: A new resource guide on the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act highlights the benefits to companies that voluntarily disclose potential violations and take remedial actions, but it leaves plenty of uncertainty.
abstract: A new resource guide on the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act highlights the benefits to companies that voluntarily disclose potential violations and take remedial actions, but it leaves plenty of uncertainty.

headline.main: In Bribery Law, the Watchword Is Uncertainty
